Name: Hephaestus
Abilities: Crippled Savior: When your Attack hits, but before revealing the BP card, lose -1 Trespass to gain a Crit Chance.; Hephaestum Skin: For the duration of this Godform, you cannot die from Obols. Each time you draw a You died Obol, lose -1 Trespass.

Name: Hermes
Abilities: The Messenger: For the duration of this Godform, double your Titan's Speed value.; Rearm: When you Awaken into this Godform, imediately unexhaust all your exhausted Gear. For the duration of this Godform your Gear cards cannot be exhausted.

Name: Ares
Abilities: God of War: You cannot die by raising your Rage over 9. When you are about to gain Rage above 9, ignore the gain.; Eschatonic Fuse: When you are about to perform a Power Roll, lose -1 Trespass to gain +1 Power to this roll.

Name: Artemis
Abilities: Hunter of Mortals: When you are about to perform an Attack Roll, you may set aside one non-Crit die from your Attack Dice pool. Treat this die as an automatic hit.; Critical Shot: {3, +0, 2 Red} ComplicatedAction Lose -1 Trespass to perform an Attack with your Heavenly Bow! Range 3-9, Pushback x, where X is your Total Power during this Attack.

Name: Athena
Abilities: Poisoned Wisdom: When you Awaken into this Godform, immediately choose either the AI or BP deck. For the duration of this Godform, keep the top card from the chosen deck revealed at all times.; Moirai Favor: Start of your turn: You amy lose up to -2 Fate.

Name: Dionysus
Keywords: Roll Out, Bypass, Auto-inspire, Lifeline, Voluntary Knockdown
Abilities: Drunken Enlightenment: When you Awaken into this Godform and at the start of each of your turns, roll a d10. 1-3: Your Power die becomes Red. You gain +3 Evasion. 4-5: Your Power die becomes Black. You gain +2 Evasion. 6-7: Your Power die becomes 2 Red. You gain +1 Evasion. 8-9: Your Power die becomes White. 10: Your Power die becomes 2 White. You gain -1 Evasion.; Godly Comforter: When any Titan is about to die from crossing a Despair, Ambrosia, Bleeding, Midas, or Pain Limit, lose -1 Tresppas to ignore that death and discard as many of the corresponding tokens to have exactly 1 less than the limit.

Name: Aphrodite
Abilities: Unearthly Beauty: Fate If the Primordial Attack has a singular Target, lose -1 Trespass to change that Target to you.; Irresistible Call: MovementAction Lose -1 Trespass to make the Primordial move to you via the shortest path. Use the Primordial's Speed.

Name: Helios Apollonis Exalted
Abilities: Fly: Fate Exhaust Use during voluntary movement to ignore all Terrain tiles during this movement. You cannot end your mmovement on an Obstacle or Chasm. Fate Exhaust When you are about to perform a Climb test, automatically succeed at that test instead.; Pitiful as the Sun: You cannot die from any Curse.; Trigger Finger: {3 dice, +0, white} CombatAction Lose -1 respass to perform an Attack with your Finger! Range 3-10, Fire X, where X is your Total Power during this Attack.

Name: Hera
Abilities: Till Death Do Us: Choose another Titan. That Titan gains the PriorityTarget Priority Target token (you cannot gain the PriorityTarget token). As long as you are alive, that Titan cannot die from an Obol Draw. Each that Titan is forced to draw an Obol, lose -1 Trespass.; Scorned Mother: When fighting against The Nietzschean, the Pitiless, Ur-Fleece, Ur-Father, the Nekron, Zalmoksis, Ur-To-Ev, the Veiled Being, or The Watchress, gain +2 Power.

Name: Poseidon Exalted
Abilities: Trench of the Soul: You cannot die from Ambrosia tokens or losing (discarding or flipping) Oxygen tokens.; Source and Sacrifice: Oxygen Lose -1 Trespass to perform a Bonus Attack (once per Battle). After that, a random Titan on the Argo dies.
